DOC.detailed_description: Optical frequency domain imaging ( OFDI ) novel , high resolution intravascular imaging modality . Intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) widely use conventional imaging modality achieve optimal stent deployment . The aim randomize study evaluate impact OFDI guidance Percutaneous Coronay Intervention ( PCI ) drug-eluting stent ( DES ) compare IVUS guidance . We enroll 800 patient de novo lesion undergo PCI DES routine practice . Patients rondomely assign either OFDI-guided PCI arm IVUS-guided PCI arm . Patients follow-up contact time hospital discharge , 8 month 12 month PCI .
